Reviews.Title: Much smaller than I anticipated
Reviews.Author: Rod DeRemer
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for a young child. It appeared small, was inexpensive and was pink. However, when it arrived it was much smaller than I anticipated, too small for the intended recipient. Fortunately (for me), the package was broken open and one piece of the camera kit was missing. I was able to return it free of charge.I know nothing of the picture quality. If it takes better pictures than a smartphone, perhaps it can be useful.

ProductInfo.Features:
3 USES IN 1 DEVICE
CAPTURES 20 PICTURES AT CIF, 81 PICTURES AT QCIF, AVI VIDEO FILES
RESOLUTION - CIF RESOLUTION 288 X 352
LENS - F/2.8 .25" CMOS SENSOR
Still pictures, video, webcam
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox Pendant Digital Camera - Pink
